title: UI: Tick card component
description:
Tick card showing:
- ID badge (colored by type)
- Title (truncated)
- Priority indicator (P1/P2/P3)
- Status icon (same as tk view)
- Awaiting badge if set
- Requires badge if set
- Blocked indicator if blocked

Cards are clickable to open detail panel.

AGENT VERIFICATION:
- Use agent-browser to navigate to http://localhost:3000
- Verify cards render in appropriate columns
- Verify status icons match tk view
- Verify blocked ticks show indicator
- Take screenshot

HUMAN REVIEW:
- URL: http://localhost:3000
- Verify cards are readable and scannable
- Check visual hierarchy is clear
